name: TMG (Trimethylglycine / Betaine)
description: Methyl donor that supports the methionine-homocysteine cycle, helping to lower homocysteine and support SAM (S-adenosylmethionine) production. Important companion to NMN/NR supplementation to replenish methyl groups consumed in NAD+ metabolism.

dosage.notes: Essential co-supplement with NMN/NR to avoid methyl donor depletion. Also known as betaine (from beets). Take with meals. Very affordable.

keyFindings: Effectively lowers homocysteine levels (independent cardiovascular risk factor)
Compensates for methyl group depletion from NAD+ precursor supplementation
Protects against fatty liver disease in clinical studies
